unnormalised: For passport stuff, it's slightly different. You gotta check the Passport Seva Kendra (PSK) website, passportindia.gov.in. They'll have the specific address for your area's PSK. For example, "Passport Seva Kendra, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, 500034" if you're in that area. PSKs are pretty widespread, so finding one near you shouldn't be too difficult. Don't just randomly send stuff to "Ministry of External Affairs, Delhi, 110001" unless instructed!

unnormalised: And for Aadhaar related things, check the UIDAI website. While most things are online, if you need to send a letter or something, look for the UIDAI regional office address. For example, "UIDAI Regional Office, Lucknow, UP, 226001". Keep in mind, these addresses can change, so *always* double-check on the official government websites before sending anything!
